alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 3:32PM EST until December 19 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Occasional lake effect snow showers expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations will be concentrated across the western portion of the county. The snow band will be located near Route 28 and the towns of Inlet and Raquette Lake late this afternoon into the early evening. The snow band may oscillate a bit before shifting southward overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
